channel.title: Unable to connect : Login server offline
channel.description:
This is only me that it happens to.
I am using Windows 7 Ultimate 64-bit on an Admin Account
My antivirus is ESET Smart Security 4, the firewall is disabled on it. I have set rules on 'Windows Firewall with Advanced Settings'
And I still get this error

item.title: Unable to connect : Login server offline
item.dc:creator: @StabbingscapeOnline StabbingscapeOnline
item.description:
@StabbingscapeOnline wrote:

i have just that same problem i have windows 7 64 bits
and i opened ports and all but… my server still off

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to connect : Login server offline
